snippet.title: Soccer Squad game: The football market
snippet.description:
Soccer Squad is a football game inspired by a masterpiece from 1990 Dino Dini Player Manager. 
In this demo: Football Market and management views. 

We are reproducing the same elements that were present in the original Player Manager. This is just to get the mechanics of the game right. 

The code behind is created from scratch adding confederation and national teams plus more. We will start restyling and modernise UI elements later on.
